title: help cant open store
body: since last patch i cant open the store, if i open the game will crash how can i solve it

replies.body:
Flail around maniacally for about twenty minutes.

Then, go into Internet Options from the Control Panel. Reset all settings to their defaults. Then, go to "Security" and set its level for Internet to "Medium-Low".
still no working, i also re install the client but not thing change

Try switching out your connection for another, ie. use your phone's tethered hotspot or a friend's connection instead of your own to connect to the store. Tell me if that works, or if you can do it at all.
hi i just try to use the phone hotspot and my uni network but no work.

Ok, disable any firewalls/anti-virus programs you may have on your computer. Then, try uninstalling them (if you know how to reinstall, that is).

If that fails, look over [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) and try everything there. Mainly, change your DNS, see if it works, and then try resetting your modem.

Best of luck.
